backend/main.mo: Defines actor data models for profiles, tasks, overtime, decisions, and initializes storage maps and avatar defaults.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries linking feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries of various frontend component and hook files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base setup with theme color variables for light and dark modes and global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level app that handles authentication flow, loading state, and theme/i18n providers.
frontend/src/components/auth/Authenticat: Controls authenticated user flow including role retrieval, profile onboarding, and app shell rendering.
frontend/src/components/auth/FirstManage: Empty placeholder file for a first-manager confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginScreen: Login screen letting users choose assistant or manager role, optionally enter a manager token, and initiate Internet Identity login.
frontend/src/components/auth/RoleChoiceS: UI for selecting assistant or manager role, handling session-persisted selections and triggering role selection mutations.
frontend/src/components/avatars/avatarMa: Empty placeholder file for avatar manifest data.
frontend/src/components/avatars/AvatarPi: Displays a selectable grid of dental avatars with loading, error, and empty states.
frontend/src/components/avatars/DentalAv: Renders an SVG dental avatar or a fallback if missing or invalid, using data URIs and error handling.
frontend/src/components/avatars/Generate: Generates a pastel-colored circular SVG avatar displaying user initials.
frontend/src/components/avatars/ProfileA: Chooses between uploaded photo, dental avatar, or generated initials avatar based on priority.
frontend/src/components/badges/badges.ts: Defines the static list of badge metadata including IDs, translation keys, and icons.
frontend/src/components/badges/BadgeShel: Side panel listing all badges, highlighting earned ones with translations and UI styling.
frontend/src/components/common/QueryErro: Full-screen fallback UI showing an error message with a retry button.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Top navigation header with logo, theme/language controls, user menu, profile avatar, and badge/settings access.
Main application wrapper providing header, tab navigation, page rendering, and footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/LanguageS: Dropdown allowing users to switch between supported languages.
frontend/src/components/layout/ThemeTogg: Button toggling between light and dark themes using next-themes.
frontend/src/components/manager/TaskAudi: Displays a table of completed tasks with user, type, comments, and photo indicators using profile lookup.
frontend/src/components/manager/TaskComp: Builds a bar chart showing number of completed tasks per user based on task data.
frontend/src/components/manager/UserPick: Renders a dropdown for selecting a user, showing avatars and usernames, and returns the selected Principal.
frontend/src/components/navigation/TabNa: Provides a simple tab bar UI that switches active tabs through callbacks.
frontend/src/components/overtime/Overtim: Form for creating overtime entries with validation, date inputs, and add/deduct logic.
Lists overtime entries sorted by date, showing signed minutes and formatted dates.
Calculates and displays total overtime minutes and a composite day/hour/minute breakdown.
frontend/src/components/profile/PrivacyP: Provides data export and local data deletion options within a settings panel using cached query data.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileO: Modal for initial profile setup, allowing username, initials, avatar selection, and optional photo upload with progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileP: Component for selecting, previewing, validating, and removing a profile photo with optional upload progress display.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Slide-in panel for editing an existing profile, managing avatars, uploading or removing profile photos, and accessing privacy settings.
frontend/src/components/tasks/CompleteTa: Dialog for completing a task with optional comment and before/after photos that are converted into blobs before submission.
frontend/src/components/tasks/CreateTask: Dialog for creating a new task with title, description, and task type selection.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskCard.t: Card displaying task details, status, and actions such as completing or resetting tasks with visual indicators.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskList.t: Sorts and displays tasks with completed items last and type priority; renders TaskCard list or empty state.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages authenticated or anonymous backend actors, refetching dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthz.ts: Provides hooks to fetch caller user role and admin status using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useBadges.ts: Computes earned badges based on overtime entries and completed tasks.
frontend/src/hooks/useDentalAvatars.ts: Fetches all dental avatars from the backend and provides lookup by ID.
frontend/src/hooks/useI18n.ts: Returns i18n context for translations, throwing if provider is missing.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity login state, identity loading, and context access.
frontend/src/hooks/useManagerOvertime.ts: Fetches overtime entries for a specific user and prepares export-friendly data.
frontend/src/hooks/useManagerTasks.ts: Retrieves task data for export through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotify.ts: Provides toast-based success, error, info notifications and standardized error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useOvertime.ts: Gets caller overtime entries and allows creating new entries with cache updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file noting shared query patterns; main logic lives in specialized hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useRoleSelection.ts: Handles selecting assistant or manager roles and invalidates related auth queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useTasks.ts: Fetches tasks and supports creating, completing, resetting, and auto-retrying weekly tasks.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Manages fetching, saving, and updating caller and user profiles including photo uploads.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx: Provides a React context for language selection and translation lookup with localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Defines supported languages and translation dictionaries for UI strings.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles, CSS variables for themes, and utility animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/manager/ManagerDashbo: Provides tabbed manager dashboard switching between overtime and stats views.
frontend/src/pages/manager/ManagerOverti: Allows managers to view user overtime, pick users, and export overtime data to CSV.
frontend/src/pages/manager/ManagerStatsP: Shows task statistics and audit logs and allows managers to export task data.
frontend/src/pages/OvertimePage.tsx: Displays overtime form, totals, and history, loading entries via a hook.
frontend/src/pages/TasksPage.tsx: Shows task list and creation dialog, and auto-resets recurring tasks when due.
frontend/src/utils/csv.ts: Exports arrays of objects to CSV files with proper escaping.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for handling URL parameters and session-based persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, content scanning, extended color tokens, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state describing ICP app requirements, architecture notes, and known issues for FitGebit Team Tracker, including role logic, avatars, tasks, and overtime bugs.
